1.title: Ashley/Amanda
1.plot: As a child, Amanda's father abandoned her for another family, but when she tracks him down, she learns some startling news. Meanwhile, Ashley receives the shock of a lifetime when she discovers where her father¹s been living all these years.

2.title: Alexandra/Alec
2.plot: Alexandra wants to find her father before going through with gender reassignment surgery, but will she still want to meet him when she finds out he's in jail? Meanwhile, Alec fears that his father's new family will reject him.

3.title: Avise/Lacy
3.plot: Avise is stunned to learn her father¹s been homeless for decades. She wants to find him, but has no idea where to start. Meanwhile, Lacy searches for clues as to the whereabouts of the "sperm donor" that resulted in her birth.

4.title: Kari/Angie
4.plot: Kari's father turned his back on her before she was even born. She's afraid he'll do it again, but she takes her chances and tries to find him. Meanwhile, TV reporter Angie uses social media in hopes of finding her father.

5.title: Blake/Justin
5.plot: In order to find her father, Blake must confront the drug-addicted mother that abandoned her as a child. Justin, who's faced rejection from family and friends because of his bisexuality, hopes to find acceptance by finding his father.

6.title: Alyssa and Rebekah
6.plot: The scary picture painted of Alyssa's dad is of a drug addicted, alcoholic monster but Alyssa is determined to find him anyway . After her mother's betrayal leaves Rebekah shell-shocked, she enlists a private investigator to track down her father.

7.title: Lora and Konisa
7.plot: Lora is left reeling when she discovers that her father abandoned her to raise someone else's kids, but she tries to track him down to get answers. Meanwhile, Konisa follows a lead, but is met with suspicion at every turn.

8.title: Danielle and Dax
8.plot: Danielle and Dax are in love and very lucky to have found each other. Incredibly both are also searching for their fathers. Danielle's mom was a prostitute, and Dax was told his father threw him away in a trash can, together they journey to find their fathers and the truth.

imdb.plot outline: Finding My Father is an uplifting docu-series following fourteen women and men as they search and reunite with their biological fathers. Our seekers are empowered, successful people who are living out their dreams and adding to them as they search for their fathers. They have great careers and strong relationships, but their fathers are the "missing piece" in their lives. Each one-hour episode focuses on two seekers as they undergo an amazing journey of healing and discovery.
imdb.title: Finding My Father
plot: _Finding My Father_ (qv) is an uplifting docu-series following fourteen women and men as they search and reunite with their biological fathers.
